basics.name: Holly Lopez
basics.label: Computational Linguist & Information Scientist
basics.summary: a computational linguist & information scientist, who researches abusive language detection, the creation of high-quality linguistic resources, and the development of socially responsible AI systems

highlights: Facilitated design workshops in which 27 family engagement liaisons developed family outreach initiatives at Title I schools across the district
Led the Supplemental Education Services program in the iterative design process for three years and used mixed-methods research to inform incremental change throughout the program’s life cycle

Professional Experience.summary: •	Performed and designed user experience research for web products and surveys.
